Experience again Exvelten's Soundtrack!

Musical Style:


    [Ambient]
    [Ethereal]

Made With: FL Studio 12, Cubase 7.5, Abelton 10, Notion6
data.short_description: Music is sad. Music is Beautiful. Music is imagination. As is Exvelten.Listen to the music. Play the Game. Reminisce. Be happy and upbeat. Be dark and lost.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 512 MB available space
